name: Getting Things Done Dashboard
description: Notion Dashboard for Personal Task and Project ManagementThis template for Notion streamlines your project and task management by organising tasks and projects according to the Getting Things Done (GTD) methodology.Features:ProjectsTasksAreasGTD organisationPomodoro timerNotes and To-do ChecklistSpotify PlaylistCalendar ViewAesthetic StyleFAQs1. What is Notion?Notion is a comprehensive and fully-integrated workspace that simplifies note-taking, task management, project planning, and organisation
features: GTD organisation; Pomodoro timer; Notes and To-do Checklist; Spotify Playlist; Calendar View; Aesthetic Style
